title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Social Media
body: Social Media       Nez Perce National Historical Park is using new ways to bring the park experience to visitors. We are using Twitter and Facebook to connect you to the park. Facebook Please join us on our facebook account! It can be accessed through this link or if you have a Facebook account, go ahead and type Discover Nez Perce National Historical Park into the search bar. Twitter You can follow park news and events on Twitter @NezperceNP. Big Hole National Battlefield's feed is @BigholeNPS and Bear Paw is @BearpawNPS. YouTube The park has a YouTube channel which it is beginning to populate with short videos on the park. It can be reached through YouTube. Engaging the Community The park has received funding to engage teachers and students in Idaho, Oregon, and Montana to create virtual tours of battlefields of 1877. If you would like to follow this project, please pay them a visit on Facebook and a blog.
